dialog-wisdom.name: Zen Master
messages:
Ah, hello little Goat.
Have you come to me seeking wisdom?

dialog-wisdom.name: Player
messages: :: goat noises ::

dialog-wisdom.name: Zen Master
messages:
If you are the smartest person in the room,
then you are in the wrong room

You cannot cross the sea merely by standing
and staring at the water.

Your assumptions are your windows on the
world. Scrub them off every once in a
while, or the light won't come in.

Before you criticize someone,
you should walk a mile in their shoes.
That way, when you criticize them, you're
a mile away and you have their shoes.

dialog-wisdom.name: Player
messages: :: goat noises intensify ::

dialog-wisdom.name: Zen Master
messages:
Ah, I see that you are seeking only
my strongest wisdom.

When you see a variable prefixed with an
ampersand, think:
"that is the `And`ress (address)"
of the data in question.

dialog-wisdom.name: Player
messages: :: happy goat noises ::

dialog-strong_bad.name: Strong Bad
messages:
I was told that Fhqwhgads would be here.
Have you seen him?
I don't know who it is,
but it probably is Fhqwhgads.

dialog-strong_bad.name: Player
messages:
Sounds kinda sketchy.
And I'm into it.
I'll keep an eye out.

dialog-strong_bad.name: Strong Bad
messages: Yeah, you BETTER keep an eye out.
You don't wanna know what could happen...
to someone who doesn't keep an eye out.

dialog-bender.name: Player
messages: Hey, robot, could you make me a smoothie?

dialog-bender.name: Bender
messages:
PFFFFT NO, make your own smoothie!
Who do I look like to you?

dialog-bender.name: Player
messages:
I don't know, I thought your name was
like... Blender or something?

dialog-bender.name: Strong Bad
messages: BWAHAHAHA!

dialog-bender.name: Bender
messages: HEY, CAN IT BOXING-MASK FOR FACE!

For your information, PLAYER,
my name is BENDER! Don't wear it out!

dialog-trekkie.name: Farmer Trekkie
messages:
Oh no! All me AOL free trial hours
have expired! Me need to get back on
INTERNET!

dialog-trekkie.name: Player
messages: Wait, what?

dialog-trekkie.name: Farmer Trekkie
messages: Me being left behind in Yahoo Chat Rooms!
